creator: stevel@apache.org
text:
This is happening way down in the java runtime. build properties files are like
any other java Properties file, and follow the same rules. How are we meant to
deal with this? by editing the java runtime?

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
<property> reads Java properties files, which have a well defined format,
including the behavior of backslashes.

The biggest annoyance may be that this format is not consistent between JDK 1.1
and later versions.
